name: Enari
description:
Enari is a turn based combat game where attacks cost effort that can be regained by sleep. It's about a powerful mermaid wanting to be just left alone to be able to rest cozily while the local residents keep challenging her to test their might

Arts by https://tobenetois.itch.io/

Music and SFX by https://izmotion.itch.io/

W/A/S/D or Arrows to move

Enter to select
